com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener

Interface ConnectionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectedListener, DisconnectedListener, ExceptionListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnection

    public interface ConnectionListener
extends ConnectedListener, DisconnectedListener, ExceptionListener
    The ConnectionListener interface describes a handler that is able to handle any kind of Connection related events. It is a combined interface consisting of listeners for connected, disconnected and exception cases.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener.ConnectedListener

        onConnection

      • Methods inherited from interface com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener.DisconnectedListener

        onDisconnect

      • Methods inherited from interface com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener.ExceptionListener

        onExceptionally
